data.expected_result: All the checkboxes stay in the same size.
data.short_description: When you add a description to any of your applications on <https://discordapp.com/developers/applications>, the checkboxes below the permissions change their size abruptly.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open https(colon)//discordapp(dot)com/developers/applications - Create a new application. - Observe the checkboxes under permissions in irl examples. - Add a description to your application. - Now, observe the checkboxes.
